mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (created_at ,modified_at,is_delete , contents, qna_status, title, view_count, user_id) VALUES (now(), now(), 0, #{qnaSaveRequest.contents}, 0, #{qnaSaveRequest.title}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, qc.* AS qnaComment, ( SELECT qc.*, COUNT(qr.qna_comment_id) FROM qna_reply qr LEFT JOIN qna_comment qc ON qc.qna_comment_id = qr.qna_comment_id WHERE qr.qna_comment_id = qc.qna_comment_id AND qr.is_delete = false; ) AS qnaReplyInfo FROM qna q LEFT JOIN qna_comment qc ON q.qna_id = qc.qna_id WHERE q.qna_id = #{qnaId} AND q.is_delete = false;
